title: User Login Authentication
description: Develop a secure user login feature that validates credentials and establishes authenticated sessions for authorized application access.
iWant: to log into the application using my email and password
soThat: I can access my personal account and use protected features securely
acceptanceCriteria: Login form accepts valid email and password combinations
Invalid credentials display clear error messages without revealing user existence
Successful login redirects to user dashboard with active session
Login attempts are rate-limited to prevent brute force attacks
